meanings.definition: To advertise (a product or service) on a billboard.
meanings.sent1: The company is billboarding their new phone on a huge billboard.
meanings.sent2: They are billboarding the upcoming concert on the city's main billboard.
meanings.sent3: Billboarding the sale on a tiny billboard would be quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile billboards happiness to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights billboarding the city's name were mesmerizing at night.

meanings.definition: The act of promoting something on a billboard.
meanings.sent1: The billboardings in the city are eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: Billboarding is an effective way to reach a large audience.
meanings.sent3: Seeing billboarding for a dentist on a candy billboard is ironic.
meanings.sent4: His loud laughter was like a billboarding of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The billboarding of the new movie made everyone excited to see it.
